articles.description: Aqara’s seven-inch touchscreenPanel Hub S1 Plushas gotten amajor updatethat adds built-in Siri support, so you can tap Apple’s virtual assistant, even when your phone or HomePod aren’t nearby. Whilebuilt-in Siriisn’t new, it hasn’t enjoyed the same level of support as Alexa. For now, unfortunately, the S1 Plus isn’t available in the US, however.

articles.description: It’s only four questions long, butNPR’stest of your ability tospot AI slopcan help you test your skills. Of course, after you pass the test (I have faith in you), there are tips for what to look out for and words of caution about just assuming everything is fake. Your skepticism can be weaponized in what’s called the “liar’s dividend.”
